p: Wild type VRC01 accumulated in the liver and small intestine, while the LS variant was concentrated in highly vascularised tissues such as the heart, lungs, uterus and colon. However, by 1 week after administration both antibodies had similar distribution. This technology will provide much needed insight into the mechanisms mediating antibody distribution to specific anatomical sites, which will be immensely valuable in advancing the wide use of therapeutic antibodies.
